original_text: You, Judah, have as many gods as you have towns; and the altars you have set up to burn incense to that shameful god Baal are as many as the streets of Jerusalem.’
korean_text: 유다야 네 신들이 네 성읍의 수와 같도다 너희가 예루살렘 거리의 수대로 그 수치스러운 물건의 제단 곧 바알에게 분향하는 제단을 쌓았도다

sentences.original_text: have as many gods as you have towns;
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 가진 성읍만큼 많은 신들을 가졌으며

sentences.original_text: and the altars you have set up
to burn incense to that shameful god Baal
sentences.korean_translation: 그 수치스러운 신 바알에게 분향하기 위한 것이며

sentences.original_text: are as many as the streets of Jerusalem.'
